<extensions defaultExtensionNs="com.intellij">
<localInspection groupKey="some.group.key" groupBundle="messages.LowerLevelBundle"/> <localInspection groupKey="some.group.key" bundle="messages.LowerLevelBundle"/> <localInspection groupKey="some.group.key"/>
<localInspection groupPathKey="some.group.path.key" groupBundle="messages.LowerLevelBundle"/> <localInspection groupPathKey="some.group.path.key" bundle="messages.LowerLevelBundle"/> <localInspection groupPathKey="some.group.path.key"/>
<localInspection key="some.key" groupBundle="messages.LowerLevelBundle"/> <localInspection key="some.key" bundle="messages.LowerLevelBundle"/> <localInspection key="some.key"/>
<globalInspection groupKey="some.group.key" groupBundle="messages.LowerLevelBundle"/> <globalInspection groupKey="some.group.key" bundle="messages.LowerLevelBundle"/> <globalInspection groupKey="some.group.key"/>
<globalInspection groupPathKey="some.group.path.key" groupBundle="messages.LowerLevelBundle"/> <globalInspection groupPathKey="some.group.path.key" bundle="messages.LowerLevelBundle"/> <globalInspection groupPathKey="some.group.path.key"/>
<globalInspection key="some.key" groupBundle="messages.LowerLevelBundle"/> <globalInspection key="some.key" bundle="messages.LowerLevelBundle"/> <globalInspection key="some.key"/>
<intentionAction> JAVA some.key messages.LowerLevelBundle <className>com.picimako.DummyIntention </className> </intentionAction>
<intentionAction> JAVA some.non.existent.key messages.LowerLevelBundle <className>com.picimako.DummyIntention </className> </intentionAction>
</extensions> </idea-plugin>
